General_Description: '''Paint the Ocean Red''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]n [[trireme]]s must be targeted if [[Athens]] hopes to maintain naval dominance."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and sank a number of Spartan triremes all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Red Grudges]] and [[To Clear the Ocean]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
